snippet: Without the injured Chris Bosh, Miami was overwhelmed in Game 3 as the Celtics repeatedly and successfully went to Kevin Garnett in the paint.
abstract: Miami Heat, without the inside help of injured forward Chris Bosh, are overwhelmed by Boston Celtics in Game 3 of the NBA Eastern Conference finals, as Boston repeatedly and successfully goes to Kevin Garnett in the paint.
lead_paragraph: Without the injured Chris Bosh, Miami was overwhelmed in Game 3 as the Celtics repeatedly and successfully went to Kevin Garnett in the paint.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Playoffs — Heat Seem to Expect Bosh to Miss Game 4
headline.main: In Bosh’s Absence, Heat Face an Inside Problem
headline.print_headline: In Bosh’s Absence, Heat Face an Inside Problem
